overview: Manuela is under mental treatment because she was the victim of a violent sexual crime 5 years ago. Her only stop is her best friend Monique. When the two women are kidnapped by a sick psychopath in an old villa, a time of unimaginable trust begins for both of them! But the house holds more secrets than the two women would like!
title: Vegetarierinnen zur Fleischeslust gezwungen 3
